name: Shocking Revelation (V)
Lore: '''Well, don''t blame me. I''m an interpreter. I''m not supposed to know a power socket from a computer terminal.''',
Text: 'Unless you have a senate majority, if opponent just took into hand or deployed character (except with an Effect with ''matching'' in game text) from Reserve Deck or just drew a card from Reserve Deck using a character''s game text, they must place 2 other cards from hand on Used Pile (if possible).',
